special_text:
[i]“Who do you trust?”[/i]
Manifest a card
from your hand. [i](Put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)[/i]
Until end of turn, creatures you control with power 2 or less can't be blocked. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player this turn, draw a card.
